Literature Review: The integration of big data into economics and finance has revolutionized the way we understand and analyze economic activity. However, despite its growing importance, big data remains largely excluded from macroeconomic and finance research. This literature review aims to bridge this gap by reviewing existing work on measuring economic activity, market power, data markets, and the role of data in financial markets. We also highlight areas where future work is needed to fully harness the potential of big data in economics and finance.
